title: Apex Business Supplies 100 Black Bold Nitrile Gloves Large Gloves Protection for Medical, Industrial - Latex-Free, Powder-Free - Ideal for Cleaning, Tattooing, Automotive More100 Large (1 Box)
features: [100 Premium Quality] Made from high-quality black nitrile, these gloves offer superior strength, durability, and puncture resistance compared to latex or vinyl gloves
[Latex-Free] Safe for individuals with latex allergies, these gloves provide a comfortable alternative without sacrificing performance.
[Enhanced Grip] Textured fingertips ensure a strong grip in both wet and dry conditions, making them ideal for a wide range of applications.
[Versatile Use] Perfect for medical professionals, mechanics, tattoo artists, chefs, and more, these gloves provide reliable protection in various industries
[Comfortable Fit] Designed to contour to the hand, these gloves provide a snug and comfortable fit for extended wear.
[Powder-Free] Eliminates the risk of powder contamination, making them suitable for sensitive environments and reducing the risk of allergic reactions.
[FDA Approved] Manufactured in compliance with FDA regulations, ensuring safety and quality standards are met.
description: Product Description Welcome to Aurelia Gloves Apex Business Supplies is a trusted name in premium-quality disposable examination gloves, dedicated to delivering reliable and top-tier solutions worldwide. With a commitment to excellence and innovation, Apex Business Supplies strives to set industry benchmarks and establish itself as a leader in providing high-quality products that meet the needs of customers across diverse markets. Previous page Next page 1 Aurelia Bold 2 Aurelia Sonic 200 3 Aurelia Bold Max 4 Aurelia Ignite 5 Aurelia Robust Best For Tattoo Nitrile gloves also protect tattoo artists from infection and punctures. Thin, flexible and chemical resistant for precision work Best For Saloon Sector Our gloves protect against chemicals and infections in the beauty industry. Latex-free, supple and comfortable for precise work. Ideal For Cleaning Protecting against chemicals and contamination in the cleaning industry. Safe grip, durable and resistant to cleaning agents. Food Grade Offer hygienic protection when handling food in the catering industry. Durable, tear-resistant and latex-free for safe handling. What is the difference between LDPE, CPE, TPE, nitrile, vinyl, and latex gloves? LDPE stands for "Low-Density Polyethylene". CPE is "Chlorinated Polyethylene". TPE means "Thermoplastic Elastomer". Nitrile is a more resistant synthetic material. Vinyl gloves is made of Polyvinylchloride (PVC). And Latex is a natural material. Can these exam gloves be used for food preparation? Our versatile nitrile gloves can be used for food preparation, perfect for home kitchens, barbecues, picnics, and the food service industry.
